revision.comment: /* Noun */ Add the opsin sense and references
revision.text: ==English== ===Noun=== {{en-noun|~}} # {{lb|en|uncountable|biochemistry}} An [[octapeptide]] present in the [[frog]] [[Xenopus laevis]]<ref>{{cite journal |last1=Araki |first1=Kengo |last2=Tachibana |first2=Shinro |last3=Uchiyama |first3=Mikio |last4=Nakajima |first4=Terumi |last5=Yasuhara |first5=Tadashi |title=Isolation and Structure of a New Active Peptide "Xenopsin"on the Smooth Muscle, especially on a Strip of Fundus from a Rat Stomach, from the Skin of Xenopus laevis |journal=Chemical and Pharmaceutical Bulletin |date=1973 |volume=21 |issue=12 |pages=2801–2804 |doi=10.1248/cpb.21.2801}}</ref> # {{lb|en|countable|biochemistry}} A group of [[opsin]]s, which are confined to [[mollusc]]s, [[rotifer]]s, [[brachiopod]]s, and [[cnidarian]]s<ref>{{cite journal |last1=Ramirez |first1=Md |last2=Pairett |first2=An |last3=Pankey |first3=Ms |last4=Serb |first4=Jm |last5=Speiser |first5=Di |last6=Swafford |first6=Aj |last7=Oakley |first7=Th |title=The last common ancestor of most bilaterian animals possessed at least 9 opsins |journal=Genome Biology and Evolution |date=26 October 2016 |pages=evw248 |doi=10.1093/gbe/evw248}}</ref> ===References=== <references />
